queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

select ma.asset , ma.function , atl.device , atl.time , atl.Lat , atl.Long , atl.GPSFixAge
from a_tracking_logging atl inner join mrqr_assets ma on atl.device=ma.uii inner join ( select device ,max(time) maxtime from a_tracking_logging group by device )latest on atl.device=latest.device and atl.time=latest.maxtime
where atl.device like 'pDEVICE' and if ('pASSET'='',true, ma.asset like 'pASSET') and if ('pFUNCTION'='',true, ma.function like 'pFUNCTION')
order by atl.device, atl.time desc
limit 2000
